stops.description: A string of pipe(|) separated stops. Stop modifiers can be added before any address separated by a colon(:). Each stop can be either an address or a set of coordinates
examples: origin:1676 40th Street, Calgary, AB|235 Heritage Drive, Calgary, AB|3368 Heritage Drive, Calgary, AB|1956 Fourth Avenue, Calgary, AB|destination:785 7th Ave, Calgary, AB
